title: Aural set, Tibetan song - part 2 pitches

content.question: The pitches heard at the beginning of part 2 can best be notated as

Eighth notes E-flat4, E-flat4, G4, B4, A4, sixteenth notes B4, D-flat5, eighth notes B4, G4.

Eighth notes E-flat4, E-flat4, G-flat4, B-flat4, A-flat4, sixteenth notes B-flat4, D5, eighth notes B-flat4, F4.

content.answer: Eighth notes E-flat4, E-flat4, G-flat4, B-flat4, A-flat4, sixteenth notes B-flat4, D-flat5, eighth notes B-flat4, G-flat4.
